name: Spicy Peppe: A Cyber Fantasy Turn-Based RPG
name_original: Spicy Peppe: A Cyber Fantasy Turn-Based RPG
description: When a deadly Virus lord plans on taking the universe and cyber-verse for himself, only a small group of 'Cylers' will help defend the universe and cyber-verse from this evil. Join Spicy Peppe, a human that is trapped between his home and cyber-space. Now it is up to him and his friends to protect their peaceful home and to stop this Virus lord. Fight, Upgrade, Travel and Learn new skills along the way in this turn-based rpg made with the Rpg Maker engine, combined with pictures made from Gacha Club, and the story and characters of the original 'Spicy Peppe' Gacha series on Youtube, created by me, Reisan SpyZeto.
